CustomField.description: Days from Blackout Start Date to 1st Payroll Date
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( X1st_Payroll_Date__c ), TODAY()- Blackout_End_Date__c , X1st_Payroll_Date__c - Blackout_End_Date__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Days from Blackout Start Date to 1st Payroll Date
CustomField.label: Time to Payroll Conv KPI
